entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with wet snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Forecast issued 06:03 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Periods of wet snow mixed with rain beginning overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 06:03 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
